p: Thermo-Gravimetric Analysis (TGA) was carried out under nitrogen atmosphere by means of a Perkin Elmer TGA7 apparatus (Perkin Elmer, Waltham, MA, USA). Gas flow of 30 mL/min and heating scan of 10 °C/min, over a temperature range 40–800 °C, were used for the analyses. Samples mass of 10 mg were used for the experiments.
